archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Enable Party
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Provide material to a party that they should find useful as their relationship with an enterprise continues to be developed, such as downloadable resources and brochures/datasheets/whitepapers.

properties.value: Enable Party provides material to a party that they should find useful as their relationship with an enterprise continues to be developed. This includes, but is not limited to downloadable resources, brochures/datasheets/whitepapers, and product offering pricing information/configuration tools. For partners it includes messaging documents and competitive information.
